column1: I took the train to go to Tokyo.

The sun sets behind the mountains, casting a warm and golden glow across the tranquil lake. Birds chirp softly, bidding farewell to the day, while the gentle rustle of leaves in the breeze adds a soothing melody to the evening air.
As the first drops of rain kiss the earth, the petrichor rises, filling the air with the nostalgic scent of a refreshing summer shower.
